website_summaries.verdict: A sleek, reliable kettle. A good buy if you want lots of bells and whistles for a reasonable price.
pros: Features an attractive, straightforward design with impressive features: 8-cup capacity, quick heating ability, and multiple temperature controls
cons: Attached lid is a bit awkward and gets in the way during use and cleaning

customer_reviews.title: Amazing kettle
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this kettle for almost 2 years now and it has worked flawlessly. It boils a full pot in about 4 minutes and I like the different temp settings as we use it for different teas and coffee. There is a keep warm option which comes in handy as well. I liked it enough that I bought another as a gift for a friend. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: A. Nash

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful kettle. Bought one for myself about 10 months ago. Love it! Bought one for my daughter and son-in-law so I could use it when I visit! (Directions are a bit confusing but it "boils" down to this: Press "Start" first, then press "Set" for temperature. "Keep warm" button flickers when water is ready. When I had a question about how it worked, company was very helpful. Great product, great value. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great except for the bottom coating is peeling off and entering the water
customer_reviews.text: I have had this kettle for two years and it works as advertised except the coating on the bottom of the kettle has been peeling off and going into the water for some time now. It's useless at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Everyone needs one of these - Excellent item.
customer_reviews.text: This will heat water to boiling temp. in just a few seconds it seems. It is attractive, simple and easy to clean. Highly recommend. If you drink tea, hot water, or instant anything, get one of these.You can choose the temperature setting and whether it keeps warm or turns of. Very cool
customer_reviews.author: Verna I.

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this item!
customer_reviews.text: Company did not honor their warranty for this product. kstuff@charter.net It stopped working while still under warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: Very quick to heat and holds temperature well. I have enjoyed this so much in the morning. It’s also great for making hummingbird food quickly. My electric stove takes so much longer to heat water.
customer_reviews.author: Camella Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Electric kettle
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I love this kettle . It’s quick to heat . If your making jello , wahla it’s faster than the stove and you just pour what you need . The temperature selection is great . We use this a lot .
customer_reviews.author: Marie Guymon

customer_reviews.title: Very fast boiling components!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my kettle. It heats up water quickly to thr preprogrammed temperature you select. The kettle is beautiful and exactly as described. There is a warming program you can use, however I have not used that yet. This is a very quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Setting lights quit working.
customer_reviews.text: I have loved this product for 8 months. Until the lights quit working. The lights that let you know what temperature you are choosing along with the flashing lights that lets you know your water is heated. Bummer because I really loved it. Could have been 5 stars !
customer_reviews.author: Aedmonds

customer_reviews.title: Very efficient large-capacity kettle!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this kettle a couple times a day for the past 8 months and am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Goldie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for tea drinkers
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He drinks various types of teas several times a day. Love the fact that you can choose your tempature. It’s very nice looking, good quality, and works great.
customer_reviews.author: BrownEyez

customer_reviews.title: Good Kettle
customer_reviews.text: I love this kettle . I am very pleased with its performance.
customer_reviews.author: flames

customer_reviews.title: Still going STRONG- Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I recommend this to anyone. I've had it for quite a few years now. I am impressed with the quality and durability. Heats up super fast. Boils even faster.
customer_reviews.author: c

customer_reviews.title: Very fast and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Love this pot! it works great and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall Dawson Price

customer_reviews.title: Makes perfect tea easy!
customer_reviews.text: Great controls that do exactly what they say they will, don't have to unplug to pour it wherever you want, and cleaning the all-metal interior's a breeze! No complaints, and I'm usually an ornery, cranky customer.
customer_reviews.author: Lee West

customer_reviews.title: Great kettle, heats quickly!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this kettle based on a friend's recommendation and have used it for about two weeks now. The kettle heats quickly and has a variable temp control making it perfect for different teas and pour over coffee. We have no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great kettle at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic kettle at a great price. Love mine and use daily for tea
customer_reviews.author: John K

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working right at the end of my warranty period
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great for tea and coffee
customer_reviews.text: I love being able to set the temperature for my tea water.
customer_reviews.author: Susan DeBlieck

customer_reviews.title: Just what my kitchen needed
customer_reviews.text: This works as expected. I’ve even over filled it and it still heated the water perfectly and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: This is the most used appliance in our home
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our home because between instant oatmeal, tea, coffee and other recipes that require hot water, the machine just works beautifully. We have it running a lot during the day and have had almost no issue at all with it. The only thing to be aware of is because of so much use, the ink on the temperature labels will run off after a while. Mechanically, it's a tank.
customer_reviews.author: SRsage

customer_reviews.title: Made my mornings easier!!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really know about energy efficiency but the water boiler is great. It boils water as quickly as a microwave boils the equivalent amount of water and is faster and much easier to use than a tea kettle. I can’t let it boil away by being distracted and forgotten. The unit also has six different temp settings for black tea, oolong and green teas.
customer_reviews.author: AlanaDeanTop Contributor: Classical Music

customer_reviews.title: A deffinate recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I seldom write product reviews but after nearly 3 years of daily use my kettle is still working as great as it did the first time I used it. It still heats water very quickly and I absolutely love the keep warm feature which allows me to keep it running until I'm done making tea or French press coffee. I will add however that I've never filled it with anything other than reverse osmosis water so I don't know how well it would stand up to tap water as I have absolutely no scale buildup in mine. As for now it looks as if I still have several years of use left in this kettle.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: This water pot works very well and has lasted over a year, even though we have hard water that leaves deposits on metal. Perfect for a household where some members want tea with boiling water and some want coffee with 190 degree water.
customer_reviews.author: katneils

customer_reviews.title: VERY SAFE
customer_reviews.text: I PURCHASED THIS WARMER FOR MY AUNTE FOR HER HOSPITAL STAY AFTER HER STROKE SHE LOVES IT NOW SHE USES IT FOR HER HOME NEXT TO HER BED AT NIGHT
customer_reviews.author: JAMES FARINA

customer_reviews.title: AVOID!!!!!  Works for a few months
customer_reviews.text: Typical imported junk. Worked great for a few months of light usage, then it just died one day.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: I dig!
customer_reviews.text: So super fast! I love it, and it's so easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: Kham

customer_reviews.title: Well over a year and still going strong
customer_reviews.text: We use this multiple times a day and it's still going strong. No issues or problems. Heats water quickly to a variety of heat. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: eyes N ears

customer_reviews.title: I love it. The design is also very attractive
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality kettle, I love it. The design is also very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Solid
customer_reviews.text: After returning the AmazonBasics model, which was seated in a wobbly fashion on its round base, this one is seated properly on the square base. Like the other one, it heats quickly and easy to use. One minor quibble: you need to use the other hand to pop the lid to fill water, in other words, not a one-hand operation.
customer_reviews.author: Hell's Bells

customer_reviews.title: It's a scam
customer_reviews.text: I was given this as a gift but I think it was actually sent from the manufacturer as part of a brushing scam. I would stay away from this product as the majority of reviews come from the same time period.
customer_reviews.author: ManilaRice

product_meta.title: Electric Kettle Temperature Control, AICOK Stainless Steel Tea Kettle with Variable Temp, Cordless Electric Water Kettle with 1500W SpeedBoil, Auto Shut Off and Boil-Dry Protection, 1.7-Liter
product_meta.description:
Color:SilverAicok electric kettle temperature control, right for almost tea, coffee, soup, oatmeal etc.

Recommend Temperature for your delicate tea leaves:
Green & White Tea Oolong Black & Herbal Tea
160-185°F 190°F 212°F

|☞Our feature:
|Stainless steel finish, even the kettle base
|The cord storage is genius design
|Measuring 1 1/2 inches, the handle is thick and sturdy.

Why choose us? We know what do you want to get :)
The best after-service, reliable quality and the best price in market.
Please contact us if you have any question about us, stop hesitating!

☞Product Specifications:
Operating Power: 1500 Watts
Dimensions: 19 x 19 x 25 cm
Kettle Weight: 1,2 kg
Boiling Time: 5~10 mins

☞Guaranteed:
Aicok Stainless Steel Kettle provides 2 years warranty. We will take full responsibility for our products.
feature_bullets: Variable temp electric kettle - 6 Recommended temperature settings. 160°F for Delicate Tea, 175°F for Green Tea, 185°F for White Tea, 190°F for Oolong Tea, 200°F For French Press Coffee. And "Boil" 212°F for Black Tea or Instant Cocoa, Oatmeal, Noodles, and more.
Keep warm tea kettles - It has a keep warm setting that turns on after it heats up and stays on for up to 2 hours. The keep warm feature is handy for the easily distracted as well.

Fast hot water kettle - The kettle packs 1500 watts of power to ensure that the water heats up in about five minutes. Save your time and makes water very hot. It also has a 90 seconds setting memory that’s lightning fast to use again.

Durable stainless steel electric kettle - The most durable and will last you a long time. Premium 304 stainless steel distinguishing from 201 series, its strong corrosion resistance can prevent rust. Looks absolutely gorgeous in kitchen with our Stainless Steel kettle Base.
Auto shut off - The kettle automatically stops boiling when it hits the temperature you selected or if it runs dry. If you have any issues with our kettle, please contact us, we have 2 year warranty.
